item.content:encoded:
Elegant Memorial 5 Photo Funeral Prayer Card

Top 10! Elegant Memorial 5 Photo Funeral Prayer Card – Sympathy Cards Elegant Memorial 5 Photo Funeral Prayer Card ready to ship the fastest Elegant Memorial 5 Photo Funeral Prayer Card quality productsPrayer cards are a thoughtful way to commemorate the memory of a loved one who has passed away. Our modern and elegant prayer cards feature a photo collage of five pictures and can be customized with a beautiful poem or prayer of your choice. These cards are perfect for use as funeral favors or as keepsakes to distribute during a memorial service or celebration of life.
Our prayer cards are designed with a focus on remembrance and are a touching way to express sympathy and offer support to those who are grieving. The poem " In Loving Memory – Loved Beyond Words Missed Beyond Measure – Forever in our Hearts" is featured prominently on the front of each card, along with the name of your loved one and their dates of birth and passing.
In addition to being a beautiful tribute to the memory of your loved one, our prayer cards also serve as a reminder of the love and support that surrounds you during this difficult time. Order yours today and let us help you honor the life of your loved one with a lasting tribute that will be cherished for years to come. COPYRIGHT © 2024 Judy Burrows, Black Dog Art – All Rights Reserved. Elegant Memorial 5 Photo Funeral Prayer Card Price:$1.77
